metadata.title: CVE-2021-40941 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In Bento4 1.6.0-638, there is an allocator is out of memory in the functionAP4_Array<AP4_TrunAtom::Entry>::EnsureCapacity in Ap4Array.h:172, asdemonstrated by GPAC. This can cause a denial of service (DOS).

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
